actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on the Judiciary.

official_title: A bill for the relief of Mr. Anton Dodaj, Mrs. Gjyljana Dodaj, Franc Dodaj, and Kristjan Dodaj.

summary.text: Makes Mr. Anton Dodaj, Mrs. Gjyljana Dodaj, Franc Dodaj, and Kristjan Dodaj each eligible for issuance of an immigrant visa or for adjustment of status to that of a lawful permanent resident of the United States under the Immigration and Nationality Act, upon payment of the required visa fees.

titles.title: A bill for the relief of Mr. Anton Dodaj, Mrs. Gjyljana Dodaj, Franc Dodaj, and Kristjan Dodaj.
